4380: Press the button in the upper left corner of the screen to return to the home page and draw the gacha!
4381: Press the button in the upper left corner of the screen to return to the home page and change the formation!
4382: You can play by selecting "Live" -> "Free Live" from the home screen
4383: From the home screen, go to "Unit" -> "Training" to raise the level
4384: You can purchase songs from the home screen by going to "Exchange" -> "Song" -> "Music Shop"
4385: Voltage consumption can be set from the left side of the "Start" button before live play
4386: You can upgrade club items from the home screen by going to "Club" -> "Customize" -> "Upgrade"
4387: You can raise the skill level by going to "Unit" > "Skill Up" from the home screen
4388: You can play by going to "Live" -> "Groovy Mix Tours" from the home screen
4389: From the home screen, go to "Unit" -> "Limit Break" to perform a limit break on your members.
4390: You can purchase various items from the home screen under "Exchange" -> "Regular" -> "Coin Exchange"
4391: You can read it from the home screen under "Story" -> "Main Story" -> "Chapter 1 ROAD TO D4FES."
4392: By performing a limit break, you can further increase the level of your members.
